compatibility.notes: OLDAP-2.2.2 is a permissive license, allowing for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses such as GPL and AGPL.

key_requirements: Include the license text in all redistributions.
Retain copyright notices in all forms of redistribution.
license.name: OLDAP-2.2.2
obligations: Retain copyright statements and notices in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright statements, notices, conditions, and disclaimer in binary redistributions.
Include a verbatim copy of the license in redistributions.
Do not use the name 'OpenLDAP' for endorsement or promotion without permission.
Do not name derived products 'OpenLDAP' without permission.
Give due credit to the OpenLDAP Project.
